Package org.apache.spark

package org.apache.spark
Core Spark classes in Scala. A few classes here, such as StorageLevel, are also used in Java, but the org.apache.spark.api.java package contains the main Java API.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.spark.io
    IO codecs used for compression.

    Pluggable serializers for RDD and shuffle data.
